title: Kled, Aurelion Sol and Illaoi need skins badly give these champs the love they deserve.
body: Its not fair on kled, a sol and illaoi to not get skins when they were released on the same time as tahm kench and jhin who both have two skins or more. I am pretty annoyed in how riot hasnt given these champions the love that they deserve as people do play them!

replies.body: fairly sure a hallowing aurelion skin is in the works for Halloween.
Look on the bright side. Yorick finally got 1.

Because theyre not played as often.. Riot have a habit of releasing champions OP and nerfing them to the point where they're unplayable..

Except Ivern.. Ivern is comparable to the Note 7.. a disaster.

Aurelion doesn't need skins, you can't reskin the sassy celestial dragon.

Kled is a rubbish champ, and because he has 2 parts, will take far longer to a make a skin for (don't expect one anytime soon)

Illaoi i can agree with, but there's not much you can do with her, other than recolours *glares at voidbringer*
